aliases: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm
description: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm is a visual novel developed by Japanese developer sprite for the PC, PlayStation Vita, PS4 and Switch. The story follows Hinata Masaya who, as a child, loved the sky sport Flying Circus but after suffering a terrible defeat he loses all motivation for it. Years later he regains his passion after meeting a new transfer student whom he agrees to train in Flying Circus.

executables.name: 蒼の彼方のフォーリズム.exe

name: 蒼の彼方のフォーリズム
